sentences.sContent: The Olympic Games were watched by literally billions of people.
sentences.sCn: 奥运会确确实实有几十亿人观看。

words.tran: 文字的；逐字的；无夸张的
拘泥于字句；直译主义；彻底写实主义
文字，字义上；无修饰；表面意义上
拘泥于字句；照字面意义解释

trans.tranCn: 确实地，真正地；逐字地； 照字面地
trans.tranOther: used to emphasize that something, especially a large number, is actually true
